programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss saņem zvanu no Pamfrijas kundzes, kura baidās, ka viņas mīlulis mirst. Skeldeilā Tristans gatavojas atgriezties Edinburgas Universitātē, bet Zigfrīdam ir citi plāni.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Pienācis laiks Daroubijas šovam, un Džeimss ir iecelts par galveno veterinārārstu, bet Zigfrīds un Tristans domā, ka Džeimss neizturēs dienu bez padošanās.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Adams Dalgliešs tiek aizsūtīts uz medmāsu skolu, lai izmeklētu kādas demonstrācijas laikā noindētas studentes nāvi. Pēc citas studentes nāves Dalglieša slepkavas medības kļūst intensīvākas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kāds draugs Dalgliešu uzaicina uz Dorsetu, kur viņš noskaidro, ka draugs un kāds netālu esošā pansionāta iedzīvotājs nesen tika noslepkavoti. Dalgliešs ir pārliecināts, ka nāves ir saistītas.

programme.desc: Džeina atgriežas Tornfīldā pēc Misis Rīdas nāves, un Ročesters beidzot viņu bildina. Vai viņa piekritīs?

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Džeina, kuras sirds ir salauzta, pamet Tornfīldu. Pārgurusi, bez naudas un cerības, viņa saļimst tīrelī, kur viņu izglābj sers Džons Riverss un viņa māsas. Viņi atgriež Džeinu dzīvē.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrodas uz tropiskās Sv. Honora salas. Kad kāds viesnīcas viesis majors Palgarve mirst drīz pēc ierašanās, Mārplu nepārliecina oficiālā versija par sirdslēkmi.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrod draudzenei darbu netālu esošajā Grīnšovas folijā. Kad vairāki biedri tiek atrasti miruši, aizdomās tiek turēti visi, un neviens nevar iedomāties, kādus noslēpumus atklās Džeina.

programme.title: Komisārs Rikardi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainais policijas inspektors Rikardi ir nolādēts, tomēr viņa lāsts ir visai noderīgs. Viņš var redzēt vardarbīgā nāvē mirušo spokus un dzirdēt viņu pēdējās domas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Džeims dodas mājās, lai izmeklētu bērnības drauga slepkavību. Peregrīna iejaucas izmeklēšanā, kas uzplēš senas Džeimsa brūces.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pirms prestižās Melburnas suņu izstādes pilsētā notiek aktīva darbība, tomēr kāds skandāls apdraud tā norisi, kad tiek atrasts kāds miris dalībnieks.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad bandas locekļa galva uzrodas uz boulinga celiņa, Peregrīne un Džeimss attopas divu Melburnas visnežēlīgāko pusaudžu bandu kara krustugunīs.

programme.desc: News stories as they happen. Analysis and coverage of the most important global events as they unfold providing insight into their significance and relevance for communities worldwide. programme.title: Men | Short Program Grand Prix | United States
Pairs | Short Program Grand Prix | United States
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Мой любимый друг
programme.desc: История девушки Маши, жизнь которой сложилась не лучшим образом. Будучи ребенком, она попала в детский дом после смерти отца и на этом ее приключения не заканчиваются.

Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Госпиталь
programme.desc: Медицинская драма "Госпиталь" о врачах и добровольцах из разных уголков мира, которые объединяют свои силы, чтобы спасать жизнь.

programme.title: Госпиталь
programme.desc: Медицинская драма "Госпиталь" о врачах и добровольцах из разных уголков мира, которые объединяют свои силы, чтобы спасать жизнь.

programme.title: Госпиталь
programme.desc: Медицинская драма "Госпиталь" о врачах и добровольцах из разных уголков мира, которые объединяют свои силы, чтобы спасать жизнь.

programme.title: Госпиталь
programme.desc: Медицинская драма "Госпиталь" о врачах и добровольцах из разных уголков мира, которые объединяют свои силы, чтобы спасать жизнь.

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Sadedzināt pēc izlasīšanas
programme.desc: CIP aģents pēc atlaišanas no darba raksta memuārus. Viņa sieva, kura ierosinājusi laulības šķiršanu, slepus iekopējusi diskā pierakstus un iedevusi advokātei, lai viņa atrastu ko kompromitējošu. Taču advokāte nejauši atstāj disku sporta zāles sieviešu ģērbtuvē, kur darbinieki to atrod. Pieņemot, ka disks satur ārkārtīgi slepenu informāciju, viņi nolemj informāciju pārdot.

programme.title: Divas Megijas
programme.desc: Policijas priekšnieks Sanderss izmeklē divu sieviešu ar vienādu vārdu dīvainās slepkavības un atšķetina mazpilsētas melu tīklu. Viņš satiek un ātri iemīlas Ritā - ziņkārīgā kaimiņienē, kura vēlas palīdzēt atrisināt noslēpumu.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Litogrāfijas mākslas radīšana.

programme.title: Tuvāk
programme.desc: No mīlestības mēs parasti atceramies kā tā sākās un kā - beidzās, un mēģinām atjaunot atmiņā kas īsti notika pa vidu. "Tuvāk" ir stāsts par četriem sākotnēji savstarpēji svešiem cilvēkiem, kurus satuvina acumirklīga iekāre. Nepārvaramajai kaislei seko neuzticība, jo viņi visi ir ļaudis, kuri tic mīlestībai no pirmā acu skatiena. Atkal un atkal.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir reāli notikumi - lielākās relikviju medības pasaules vēsturē. Otrā pasaules kara beigās, lai saglābtu mākslas šedevrus, kurus nacisti konfiscēja visā Eiropā, tiek izveidota internacionāla mākslas vēsturnieku un zinātnieku komanda. Tajā pašā laikā vācu armija, kura ir tuvu savai sakāvei, saņem pavēli iznīcināt visus mākslas darbus, kuri atrodas viņu rokās. Vai puiši, kuri ir pazīstami ar Mikelandželo freskām un Da Vinči gleznām daudz labāk, nekā ar šautenēm un kara mākslu, spēs izglābt cilvēces lielākos kultūras sasniegumus?

programme.title: Mads
programme.desc: Salā uz Misisipi upes divi jauni zēni satiek svešinieku, kurš stāsta trakus pasakas par galvasnaudas medniekiem un kādu skaistu sievieti.

programme.title: Sairuss
programme.desc: Džons ir šķīries pusmūža vīrietis, kas samierinājies ar domu par dzīvi vientulībā. Bijusī sievas, kas joprojām ir viņa labākā draudzene, gandrīz ar varu aizved Džonu uz viesībām, kur viņš iepazīstas ar savu sapņu sievieti - Molliju. Abi sāk tikties un drīz vien iemīlas, taču Mollijas greizsirdīgais dēls Sairuss, kuram ar māti ir īpaši ciešas attiecības, sāk traucēt abu laimei.

programme.title: Vīramāte-vellamāte
programme.desc: Apburošā Šarlote beidzot ir sastapusi savu ideālo vīrieti - ārstu Kevinu Fīldsu. Viņu laimei ir tikai viens šķērslis - Kevina māte! Valdonīgā un nepastāvīgā Viola Fīldsa, kura tikko zaudējusi darbu televīzijā kā šova vadītāja, nu visu uzmanību pievērsusi dēla karjerai. Baidoties, tikpat viegli kā zaudējot darbu, pazaudēt arī dēla uzmanību, Viola nolemj izjaukt laulības un kļūst par īstu vellamāti.

programme.title: Patvērums
programme.desc: Kērtiss Laforšs kopā ar sievu Samantu un nedzirdīgo meitiņu Hannu dzīvo nelielā Ohaio pilsētā. Naudas ir maz, turklāt Hannai ir nepieciešama īpaša medicīniskā aprūpe un izglītība. Tomēr par spīti visam Kērtiss un Samanta mīl viens otru, un visi kopā viņi ir laimīga ģimene. Kad Kērtiss redz šausminošus sapņus par katastrofālus plūdus nesošu vētru, viņš nolemj mazināt satraukumu, ceļot patvertni ģimenes mājas pagalmā. Rezultātā sarežģās viņa attiecības ar sievu.

programme.title: Labais medījums
programme.desc: Ģimenes vīrs sāk spriest par sava darba - bezpilotu lidaparāta pilota - ētisko pusi.

programme.title: Vīramāte-vellamāte
programme.desc: Apburošā Šarlote beidzot ir sastapusi savu ideālo vīrieti - ārstu Kevinu Fīldsu. Viņu laimei ir tikai viens šķērslis - Kevina māte! programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Saulains kajaka brauciens.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. Ar palīdzību no Kongresa viņai izdodas aizsākt vēsturisku normatīvo aktu pieņemšanu, kas palīdzēs turpmāk sievietēm iegūt tādas iespējas un aizsardzību, kāda līdz šim nav bijusi.

programme.title: Džeina Ostina sabojāja manu dzīvi
programme.desc: Agate - burvīga un pretrunu pilna, nonāk izmisīgā vienatnē. Viņas sapnis ir piedzīvot mīlestību, kura līdzinās Džeinas Ostinas romānam un viņas galvenais mērķis ir kļūt par rakstnieci. Tā vietā, viņa pavada savas dienas pārdodot grāmatas leģendārā britu grāmatnīcā Parīzē.

programme.desc: Pārgājiens Lahemā nacionālajā parkā.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. Ar palīdzību no Kongresa viņai izdodas aizsākt vēsturisku normatīvo aktu pieņemšanu, kas palīdzēs turpmāk sievietēm iegūt tādas iespējas un aizsardzību, kāda līdz šim nav bijusi.

programme.title: 20. gadsimta sievietes
programme.desc: Trīs sievietes, trīs stāsti, trīs likteņi - triju paaudžu ekrāna dīvas Anete Beninga, Elle Faninga un Grēta Gērviga dzīvā un optimistiskā stāstā par sievietēm pagājušā gadsimta 70-to gadu Kalifornijā.

programme.title: Džeina Ostina sabojāja manu dzīvi
programme.desc: Agate - burvīga un pretrunu pilna, nonāk izmisīgā vienatnē. Viņas sapnis ir piedzīvot mīlestību, kura līdzinās Džeinas Ostinas romānam un viņas galvenais mērķis ir kļūt par rakstnieci. Tā vietā, viņa pavada savas dienas pārdodot grāmatas leģendārā britu grāmatnīcā Parīzē.

programme.title: Bakers Dozen
programme.desc: Earth To Dessert. The bakers decorate beautiful miniature wedding cakes. The finalists must wow guest judge Loria Stern with an amazing dessert inspired by nature.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Guy Fieri summons Noah Cappe, Joe Sasto and Aarti Sequeira to try Japanese, Jamaican, Cuban, Greek and American favourites in Port St. Lucie, Florida!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: Eight bakers show off their skills in this Holiday-themed baking competition series with the winner taking home a whopping $50,000. With three expert judges analysing their baked treats, every mistake is identified, so these eight bakers must whip, cream, and ice to perfection if they hope to progress to the final rounds of the competition. The challenges are of course Holiday-themed, thus testing their creativity and ability to adapt. Each episode is comprised of two rounds, with the worst performing baker eliminated every week until only one remains.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

The challenges are of course Holiday-themed, thus testing their creativity and ability to adapt. Each episode is comprised of two rounds, with the worst performing baker eliminated every week until only one remains.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Cake Boss

The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: In the first shift of 24 nonstop hours, 24 talented chefs take on three challenges testing speed to impress judge Antonia Lofaso.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Kids Sweets Showdown
programme.desc: Nearly all kids love to eat sweet treats, but how many can make them? In this cooking competition series hosted by Alisson Sweeney, Sharone Hakman and Harley Morenstein, young bakers are invited to showcase their culinary talents for a slice of a hefty $10,000 cash prize. Two pairs of kids go head to head in a primary baking competition, whilst there are also "sugar rush" challenges, where the young bakers have a limited amount of time to create something delicious. Each of the dishes are judged and scored, with the best performing duo taking home the cash.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: In the first shift of 24 nonstop hours, 24 talented chefs take on three challenges testing speed to impress judge Antonia Lofaso.

programme.title: Nezvēri
programme.desc: No dzimtenes izceļojis franču pāris Spānijas laukos vada organisko saimniecību, taču rodas nesaskaņas ar vietējiem ciemata iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Kaimiņu meitene
programme.desc: Mets nav no tiem jaunekļiem, kuri sarunā randiņus. Arī abi viņa draugi meitenes plikumus redzējuši tikai pornofilmās. Bet tad Metam kaimiņos ievācas satriecošs zaķis, kura turklāt izrāda viņam uzmanību un aicina uz randiņiem. Koledžas puiši acīmredzami Metu apskauž. Taču Mets vēl nav paspējis zaudēt nevainību satriecošās skaistules sabiedrībā, kad gaismā nāk fakts, ka meitene ir ... izbijusi pornofilmu aktrise.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Bitīte Maija ir patīkami satraukta, jo tuvojas slavenās Medus spēles. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai? Taču bitītes satraukums izgaist, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju stropam piedalīties spēlēs.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Zeks un Vovo: Leģendāra leģenda
programme.desc: Iedomu pasaules sirdī, kurā mīt fantastiskas būtnes un bīstami briesmoņi, 13 gadus vecais Zaks dodas meklēt savu dvīņu brāli Kailu, kurš noslēpumaini pazudis.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Eilīna
programme.desc: Eilīna strādā zēnu pāraudzināšanas iestādē. Kad kolektīvam pievienojas jauna psiholoģe, Eilīnai ar viņu rodas īpašs kontakts. Bet viņu attiecības pavisam drīz uzņem grēcīgu pavērsienu.

programme.title: Atstātie
programme.desc: 1970. gada Ziemassvētki. Prestižā skolā uz svētku brīvdienām paliek visu nīstais skolotājs Pols, skolas pavāre Mērija un piecpadsmit gadus vecais Anguss. Pa šīm dienām šie tik ļoti atšķirīgie cilvēki ne tikai iemācīsies sadzīvot un saprast viens otru, bet arī mainīs viens otra dzīves uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Mīlestība dejas ritmā
programme.desc: Talantīgā balerīna Bārlova nolēmusi īstenot savu sapni Amerikas mākslas svētnīcā Ņujorkā. Diemžēl iepazīšanās ar svētnīcas realitāti nav īpaši patīkama – pieredzējusī baleta pasniedzēja Oksana skaidri un gaiši pasaka: Bārlova vēl nav ne tuvu pilnībai. Norijusi krupi, meitene nepadodas un piedalās jaunas Brodvejas deju izrādes atlasē. Režisors Zanders pievērš uzmanību Bārlovai un izvēlas viņu mēģinājumiem. Pēc dažām dienām topošās izrādes kodolam pievienojas talantīgais pianists Čārlijs. Tāpat kā Bārlova, viņš ieradies Ņujorkā, lai īstenotu sapni. Puisim un meitenei rodas simpātijas vienam pret otru, bet Zanders nav vienaldzīgs pret meiteni. Bārlova drīz vien sapinas mīlas trīsstūrī. Izrādes mēģinājumi kļūst arvien intensīvāki, slodze aug, un ne Bārlovai, ne Čārlijam neatliek laika nekam citam. Darbs vaiga sviedros, nemitīgā spriedze, sāncenšu nodevība un cīņa bez kompromisiem prasa visus spēkus.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: 200 % vilks
programme.desc: Kad Freda Lupina vēlēšanās piepildās ne tā, kā viņš to paredzējis, vilciņš pārvēršas par vilkati un uz Zemes nonāk palaidnīgs Mēness gariņš. Nu Fredijam jādara viss, lai atjaunotu kosmisko kārtību, pirms Zeme sadursies ar Mēnesi.

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Vilks un Lauva
programme.desc: Pēc vectēva nāves 20 gadus vecā pianiste Alma atgriežas bērnības mājās. Drīz viņas dzīvē notiek negaidīts pavērsiens. Nez no kurienes uzradusies vectēva draudzene baltā vilcene atved savu mazuli un pati nozūd. Tad netālu avarē lidmašīna, un meitene tās atlūzās atrod brīnumainā kārtā izdzīvojušu lauvēnu. Alma nolemj abus paturēt, un notiek neticamais – mazuļi kopā aug un iemīl viens otru kā brāļus. Bet idilliskā pasaule sabrūk, kad viņu noslēpums nāk gaismā.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: Kaķu mīlis
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Margo piestrādā nelielā kinoteātrī, kur iepazīstas ar biežu tā apmeklētāju, par sevi vecāko Robertu. Pāri letei aizsāktais flirts pārtop nepārtrauktā čatošanā. Kad abi nonāk līdz randiņam, Margo atklāj, ka dzīvē satiktais Roberts itin nemaz neatbilst tam Robertam, ar kuru viņa flirtējusi īsziņās. Skarbs vēstījums par dzimumu dalījumu, ķepurošanos cauri modernās randiņošanas staignājam un to, kādas bīstamas īpašības mēs mēdzam piedēvēt cilvēkiem otrpus mūsu telefoniem.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Real Madrid - Panathinaikos Aktor Athens
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: No Demo Reno

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.desc: American reality television series. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A career-driven couple is moving from Greenwich, Connecticut, to their island fantasy destination of East Hampton, New York.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese are back for round two of a crazy Frankenhouse, and theyre challenged to fix the wackiest upstairs theyve ever seen!

programme.title: Scariest House In America
programme.desc: Retta visits a haunted home with a paranormal portal, a disturbing one-room schoolhouse, and a former funeral parlour with chilling surprises.

programme.title: Scariest House In America
programme.desc: Retta reveals the winner of a $150,000 home renovation from designer Alison Victoria, transforming a once scary house into a dream home.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.desc: Jenn helps a couple renovate their house in a casual and traditional style, but Jenn and Victor clash over some porcelain countertops.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: A man and his two sons move in together after the passing of their wife and mother. Jenn delivers a space that recognises the past while giving hope for the future.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Lakehouse
programme.desc: Chip and Jo focus on custom millwork styled to match the homes mid-century modern origins and add a water feature to the courtyard.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Lakehouse

programme.desc: Alison is in the thick of her renovation and the stakes get higher when her electrical bill doubles and pricing for her fireboxes comes in.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: Two sisters in New York team up to salvage a decaying cottage built in 1900 and turn it into their vision of a quaint cosy retreat for tourists.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: New parents dream of turning an LA fixer into a luxurious Mediterranean-inspired home. But their high-end designs just might break their budget.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Newlyweds turn to Izzy to update their 1960s home. But after unexpectedly losing a job, theyre hoping that he can stick to their strict budget.

programme.title: Beach Hunters
programme.desc: Reality show revolves around homes on the sand in the most stunning beaches. programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Is a picture taken in the 1890s the first Bigfoot photo ever? Is a recording captured in Pennsylvania a genuine Bigfoot howl? Why are UFOs drawn to power lines? Did a photographer inadvertently capture a UFO at the coronation of King Charles?

programme.title: The Last Burma Star
programme.desc: To mark the 80th anniversary of VJ Day, explorer Levison Wood and historian Alex Bescoby set out on an urgent mission to honour the last surviving veterans of the Burma Campaign - the brutal, often forgotten chapter of the Second World War.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Could a prehistoric-looking creature washed ashore in Georgia be something new to local scientists? Is a death-defying experience for a toddler proof of guardian angels? And did a UFO spotted in Canada burn up in the atmosphere?

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey and Chum are crossing the Delaware to forge top-notch deals in Valley Forge, Pennsylvania. The guys are flying high in a helicopter museum to face an army of eager sellers.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Don Wildman heads beneath the skyscrapers and street vendors into a New York that few have ever seen. From a hidden Freemason tunnel and secret world of the Sandhogs, were uncovering the secret societies that built New York.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Some of Americas most important historical and cultural treasures have been lost or stolen from famous museums, government archives and private collections. Host Brad Meltzer sets out to find a number of these precious artifacts, such as George Washingtons teeth, Apollo 11 moon landing tapes, ground zero flag from the September 11 attacks, Hitlers personal photo albums, and more. Brad is also soliciting tips from the audience, and offering a money reward.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Best-selling author, Brad Meltzer is a political thriller novelist, who has now scoured records of the most revered institutions in America. Joined by a top team of investigative researchers, join Meltzer as he decodes some of Americas most perplexing mysteries.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens

He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Murder Under the Friday Night Lights

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.
